subject: Re: [junit] junit and cygwin
msgSnippet: ... JUnit is pure Java, therefore there is no such thing as JUnit for cygwin . JUnit works on any platform for which you can find a Java Virtual Machine. --
messageBody:
leotpchan wrote:

> Hi, Everyone.
> Where can I download junit for cygwin? Thanks.

JUnit is pure Java, therefore there is no such thing as "JUnit for
cygwin". JUnit works on any platform for which you can find a Java
Virtual Machine.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
